What‚Äôs coming next for Layer 2s? üîÆ

‚Ä¢ Token Airdrops: Many L2s (like Starknet, zkSync) may still drop tokens - stay active üëÄ
‚Ä¢ Cross-chain bridges: Easier movement between Ethereum and L2s
‚Ä¢ Cheaper gas: Thanks to upcoming Ethereum upgrades (like proto-danksharding)

Examples of Layer 2s you can use:

‚Ä¢ @arbitrum: Most active L2 with major DeFi protocols
‚Ä¢ @base: Coinbase-backed L2 with fast growth
‚Ä¢ @Starknet: Uses Zero-Knowledge tech for extra efficiency
‚Ä¢ @zksync: Another ZK-based L2 focusing on privacy & scale https://t.co/PTpKBd5u5B

Types of Layer 2s

Not all L2s work the same:

üîπ Rollups: Bundle many transactions into one
‚Ä¢ Optimistic Rollups: Arbitrum, Base
‚Ä¢ ZK Rollups: Starknet, zkSync

üîπ Validiums & sidechains: Different tradeoffs in speed vs security https://t.co/DhqtsLxWhf
